name: Opium of the masses
description:
A realistic historic account of the bloody idealogical battle which took place between Church and State in Russia at the turn of the 20th century!

Collect falling crates to power your war effort. Protect for churches as the flying alien-ship head of Rasputin or blow them apart as Stalin-tank.

100% Historical accuracy guaranteed.

Please contact me if you'd like to use this game in your school.

Music and sound by George Abitbol.

Made for Retro Game Jam 2013:
  • The game respects the Commodore-64 16-colour palette.
  • All the sprites fit onto a single 256x256 sheet.
  • The total display resolution is 288x288.
